title: Is Yahweh A God Of Regret? | Unapologetic 85
itunes:title: Is Yahweh A God Of Regret? | Unapologetic 85
description: How human-like is God? When the Bible says that God is our Father, what does that mean? When the Bible says that God regrets, does that mean he didn't know the future? We answer these and more on today's episode of the Unapologetic show.
